attributes.action: I want pedophile passports. so people have to prove they are not pedophiles
attributes.additional_details: I just thought that the covid passports could be a chance to get other passports on the pedophiles as they are just as much a threat to society I'm sure you would agree
attributes.background: I want passports for people who are not pedophiles. So we know who is a pedophile & restrictions can be placed on the pedophiles so they don't mix with non pedophiles in pubs restaurants etc

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Restrictions on people convicted of child sexual abuse or a matter for the courts. 

You could start a petition calling for specific restrictions on people who appear on the sex offenders register or who have been convicted of child sexual abuse, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
